SENT.plain: We report having treated patients with metastatic colorectal cancer with panitumumab in our department
Seven patients were treated with only panitumumab, and three patients were treated with panitumumab and another drug
The median number of infusions was 8 times
In the 9 cases that could be evaluated, the disease control rate was 66
Skin toxicity was observed in all patients
A low serum magnesium value of grade 3 was observed in one patient
We consider that treatment with panitumumab for patients with metastatic colorectal cancer was a safe option
